using System.Data.SqlClient;

// NOTA: Debe tenet instalado el NuGet System.Data.SqlClient Version: 4.8.3 ó superior
namespace $EspacioNombre$.Services;

/// <summary>
/// $TableName$ Services
/// </summary>
/// <seealso cref="PruebaDapper.BaseRepository&lt;PruebaDapper.Campanas&gt;" />
/// <autogeneratedoc />
public class $TableName$Services : BaseRepository<$TableName$>
{
    /// <summary>
    /// Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="$TableName$Services" /> class.
    /// </summary>
    /// <param name="conexion">The conexion.</param>
    /// <param name="sqlTransaction"></param>
    public $TableName$Services(SqlConnection conexion, SqlTransaction sqlTransaction = null) :
            base(conexion, sqlTransaction: sqlTransaction)
    {
        QuerySelectByID = $"Select * From $TableName$ Where $Clave_Primaria$ = @Id";

        NoQueryInsert = @"Insert into $TableName$ $FieldssInsert$; //(ClienID,Campana,Fecha) Values (@ClienID,@Campana,@Fecha)";

        NoQueryUpdate = @"Update $TableName$ 
                            SET $FieldsUpdate$";

        NoQueryDelete = $"delete from $TableName$ Where $Clave_Primaria$ = @id";
    }
}
